title: The Magical, Wonderful Road to Impeachment - Trump Acquitted | Neil Patrick Harris
itunes:title: The Magical, Wonderful Road to Impeachment - Trump Acquitted | Neil Patrick Harris
description:
Donald Trump is acquitted in his second impeachment trial, The Daily Show correspondents talk about their year under lockdown, and Neil Patrick Harris discusses his role on "It's a Sin."
